trans-unit.source: Quote Character
trans-unit.target: 引用字符

trans-unit.source: Quote identifiers (such as database, table, and column names) within backtick (`) characters. If the ANSI_QUOTES SQL mode is enabled, identifiers are quoted within (") characters. This option is enabled by default. It can be disabled with --skip-quote-names, but this option should be given after any option such as --compatible that may enable --quote-names.
trans-unit.target: 反引号（ ` ）字符内的引号标识符（例如数据库，表和列名）。如果启用了 ANSI_QUOTES SQL模式，则标识符用（ " ）字符引起来。默认情况下启用此选项。可以使用 --skip-quote-names 禁用此选项，但应在任何选项后加上 --compatible 可以启用 --quote-names 的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Quotes a string as a JSON value

trans-unit.source: Quotes a string as a JSON value, usually for producing valid JSON string literals for inclusion in JSON documents. Wraps the string with double quote characters and escapes interior quotes and other special characters, returning a utf8mb4 string.
trans-unit.target: 将一个字符串作为JSON值引用,通常用于生成有效的JSON字符串字元,以便包含在JSON文档中。用双引号字符包裹字符串,并转义内部引号和其他特殊字符,返回一个utf8mb4字符串。

trans-unit.source: Quotes a string as a JSON value.
trans-unit.target: 引用一个字符串作为JSON值。

trans-unit.source: Quotes a string to produce a result that can be used as a properly escaped data value in an SQL statement. The string is returned enclosed by single quotes and with each instance of single quote ("'"), backslash ("\"), ASCII NUL, and Control-Z preceded by a backslash. If the argument is NULL, the return value is the word "NULL" without enclosing single quotes.
trans-unit.target: 引用字符串以产生可在SQL语句中用作正确转义的数据值的结果。返回的字符串用单引号引起来，并带有单引号（“ ' ”），反斜杠（“ \ ”）， ASCII NUL 和Control-Z的每个实例，其后加反斜杠。如果参数为 NULL ，则返回值为单词“ NULL ”，而不用单引号引起来。

trans-unit.source: Quotes are optional for the character set or collation clauses.
trans-unit.target: 对于字符集或整理子句,引号是可选的。

trans-unit.source: RANGE COLUMNS and LIST COLUMNS Partitioning Types

trans-unit.source: RANGE COLUMNS and LIST COLUMNS are variants of, respectively, RANGE and LIST. With these partitioning types there is not a single partitioning expression; instead, a list of one or more columns is accepted. The following rules apply:
trans-unit.target: RANGE COLUMNS和LIST COLUMNS分别是RANGE和LIST的变体。对于这些分区类型，没有一个分区表达式。而是接受一个或多个列的列表。适用以下规则：

trans-unit.source: RANGE Partitioning Type
trans-unit.target: 范围 分区类型

trans-unit.source: RANGE specifies the window as a logical offset. If the the expression evaluates to a numeric value then the ORDER BY expression must be a numeric or DATE type. If the expression evaluates to an interval value then the ORDER BY expression must be a DATE data type.
trans-unit.target: RANGE指定窗口为逻辑偏移。如果表达式的值是一个数值,那么ORDER BY表达式必须是一个数值或DATE类型。如果表达式评价的是一个区间值,那么ORDER BY表达式必须是一个DATE数据类型。

trans-unit.source: RANK
trans-unit.target: RANK

trans-unit.source: RANK()
trans-unit.target: RANK()

trans-unit.source: RANK() is a window function that displays the number of a given row, starting at one and following the ORDER BY sequence of the window function, with identical values receiving the same result. It is similar to the ROW_NUMBER() function except that in that function, identical values will receive a different row number for each result.
trans-unit.target: RANK（）是一个窗口函数，它显示一个给定行的编号，从一个窗口开始，然后按照该窗口函数的ORDER BY序列，相同的值接收相同的结果。它类似于ROW_NUMBER（）函数，但在该函数中，相同的值将为每个结果接收不同的行号。

trans-unit.source: RESET SLAVE
trans-unit.target: 重置奴隶

trans-unit.source: RESET SLAVE makes the slave forget its replication position in the master's binary log. This statement is meant to be used for a clean start. It deletes the master.info and relay-log.info files, all the relay log files, and starts a new relay log file. To use RESET SLAVE, the slave replication threads must be stopped (use STOP SLAVE if necessary).
trans-unit.target: RESET SLAVE使从属设备忘记其在主设备二进制日志中的复制位置。该语句旨在用于一个干净的开始。它将删除master.info和relay-log.info文件，所有中继日志文件，并启动新的中继日志文件。要使用RESET SLAVE，必须停止从属复制线程（如有必要，请使用STOP SLAVE）。

trans-unit.source: ROW_COUNT() does not take into account rows that are not directly deleted/updated by the last statement. This means that rows deleted by foreign keys or triggers are not counted.

trans-unit.source: ROW_NUMBER()
trans-unit.target: ROW_NUMBER()

trans-unit.source: ROW_NUMBER() is a window function that displays the number of a given row, starting at one and following the ORDER BY sequence of the window function, with identical values receiving different row numbers. It is similar to the RANK() and DENSE_RANK() functions except that in that function, identical values will receive the same rank for each result.
trans-unit.target: ROW_NUMBER（）是一个窗口函数，显示给定行的编号，从一个窗口函数的ORDER BY序列开始，并以该序列的相同值接收不同的行号。它类似于RANK（）和DENSE_RANK（）函数，但在该函数中，相同的值将为每个结果获得相同的排名。

trans-unit.source: ROW_NUMBER() was first introduced with window functions in MariaDB 10.2.0.
trans-unit.target: ROW_NUMBER（）最初是在MariaDB 10.2.0中通过窗口函数引入的。

trans-unit.source: Rather than building user and group mapping into the pam authentication plugin, MariaDB thought that it would cover the most use cases and offer the most flexibility to offload this functionality to an external PAM module. The pam_user_map PAM module was implemented by MariaDB to facilitate this. This PAM module can be configured in the PAM service used by the pam authentication plugin, just like other PAM modules.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB并没有将用户和组映射构建到 pam 身份验证插件中，而是考虑了大多数用例，并提供了最大的灵活性来将该功能卸载到外部PAM模块。该 pam_user_map PAM模块被MariaDB的实施，以促进这一点。就像其他PAM模块一样，可以在 pam 身份验证插件使用的PAM服务中配置此PAM模块。

trans-unit.source: Rather than storing the encryption key in a local file, this plugin keeps the master key in AWS KMS. When you first start MariaDB, the AWS KMS plugin will connect to the AWS Key Management Service and ask it to generate a new key. MariaDB will store that key on-disk in an encrypted form. The key stored on-disk cannot be used to decrypt the data; rather, on each startup, MariaDB connects to AWS KMS and has the service decrypt the locally-stored key(s). The decrypted key is stored in-memory as long as the MariaDB server process is running, and that in-memory decrypted key is used to encrypt the local data.
trans-unit.target: 这个插件不是将加密密钥存储在本地文件中,而是将主密钥保存在AWS KMS中。当你第一次启动MariaDB时,AWS KMS插件会连接到AWS密钥管理服务,并要求它生成一个新的密钥。MariaDB会将该密钥以加密的形式存储在磁盘上。存储在磁盘上的密钥不能用于解密数据;相反,在每次启动时,MariaDB都会连接到AWS KMS,并让该服务对本地存储的密钥进行解密。只要MariaDB服务器进程在运行,解密后的密钥就会存储在内存中,而内存中的解密密钥将用于加密本地数据。

Since 100 already does not match 40, the expression evaluates to true immediately, regardless of the 100's matching. It may be more easily readable to use SOME in a case such as this:

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the format, binary log events are always stored in a binary format, rather than in plain text. MariaDB includes the mysqlbinlog utility that can be used to output binary log events in a human-readable format.
trans-unit.target: 无论采用哪种格式，二进制日志事件始终以二进制格式而不是纯文本格式存储。MariaDB包含 mysqlbinlog 实用程序，可用于以人类可读的格式输出二进制日志事件。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of whether InnoDB strict mode is enabled, if a DML statement is executed that attempts to write a row that the table's InnoDB row format can't store, then InnoDB will raise an error with this message.
trans-unit.target: 无论是否启用InnoDB严格模式，如果执行了DML语句试图写入表的InnoDB行格式无法存储的行，那么InnoDB都会在此消息中引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of which locking strategy is used to perform a DDL operation, InnoDB will have to exclusively lock the table for a short time at the start and end of the operation's execution. This means that any active transactions that may have accessed the table must be committed or aborted for the operation to continue. This applies to most DDL statements, such as ALTER TABLE, CREATE INDEX, DROP INDEX, OPTIMIZE TABLE, RENAME TABLE, etc.
trans-unit.target: 无论使用哪种锁定策略执行DDL操作，InnoDB都必须在操作执行的开始和结束时在短时间内专门锁定表。这意味着必须提交或中止任何可能已访问表的活动事务，操作才能继续。这适用于大多数DDL语句，例如 ALTER TABLE ， CREATE INDEX ， DROP INDEX ， OPTIMIZE TABLE ， RENAME TABLE 等。

trans-unit.source: Regardless, you need to ensure that the second cluster is not accepting any writes other than those that it replicates from the cluster at this stage.
trans-unit.target: 无论如何,您需要确保第二个群集在此阶段不接受除它从群集复制的写入以外的任何写入。

trans-unit.source: Regardless, you need to ensure that the second cluster is not accepting any writes other than those that it replicates from the first cluster at this stage.
trans-unit.target: 无论如何,您需要确保第二个群集在此阶段不接受除从第一个群集复制的写入以外的任何写入。

trans-unit.source: Releases the lock named by the string str that was obtained with GET_LOCK(). Returns 1 if the lock was released, 0 if the lock was not established by this thread (in which case the lock is not released), and NULL if the named lock did not exist. The lock does not exist if it was never obtained by a call to GET_LOCK() or if it has previously been released.
trans-unit.target: 释放由使用GET_LOCK（）获得的字符串 str 命名的锁。如果释放了锁，则返回1；如果未通过此线程建立锁（在这种情况下，则不释放锁），则返回0；如果指定的锁不存在，则返回 NULL 。如果从未通过调用 GET_LOCK() 获得该锁，或者该锁先前已被释放，则该锁不存在。

The CAST() function can be used to forcee the new table to use certain types.

trans-unit.source: Remote Indexing
trans-unit.target: 远程索引

trans-unit.source: Remote indexing is specific to the MYSQL table type. It is equivalent to what the FEDERATED storage does. A MYSQL table does not support indexes per se. Because access to the table is handled remotely, it is the remote table that supports the indexes. What the MYSQL table does is just to add a WHERE clause to the SELECT command sent to the remote server allowing the remote server to use indexing when applicable. Note however that because CONNECT adds when possible all or part of the where clause of the original query, this happens often even if the remote indexed column is not declared locally indexed. The only, but very important, case a column should be locally declared indexed is when it is used to join tables. Otherwise, the required where clause would not be added to the sent SELECT query.
trans-unit.target: 远程索引特定于MYSQL表类型。它等同于FEDERATED存储的功能。 MYSQL表本身不支持索引。由于对表的访问是远程处理的，因此支持索引的是远程表。 MYSQL表所做的只是向SELECT添加一个WHERE子句发送到远程服务器的命令，允许远程服务器在适用时使用索引。但是请注意，因为CONNECT在可能的情况下添加了原始查询的全部或部分where子句，所以即使没有将远程索引列声明为本地索引，这种情况也经常发生。应该在本地声明索引的唯一但非常重要的情况是用于联接表时。否则，必填的where子句将不会添加到发送的SELECT查询中。

trans-unit.source: Replication alone is not sufficient for backup. It assists in protecting against hardware failure on the master server, but does not protect against data loss. An accidental or malicious DROP DATABASE or TRUNCATE TABLE statement will be replicated onto the slaves as well. Care needs to be taken to prevent data getting out of sync between the master and the slave.
trans-unit.target: 单独复制是不足够的备份。它有助于防止主服务器上的硬件故障，但不能防止数据丢失。意外或恶意的 DROP DATABASE 或 TRUNCATE TABLE 语句也将被复制到从属服务器上。需要注意防止主机和从机之间的数据不同步。

trans-unit.source: Replication from MySQL 5.6 with GTID, binlog_rows_query_log_events and ignorable events works starting from MariaDB 10.0.22 and MariaDB 10.1.8. In this case MariaDB will remove the MySQL GTIDs and other unneeded events and instead adds its own GTIDs.
trans-unit.target: 从MySQL 5.6使用GTID，binlog_rows_query_log_events和可忽略事件进行复制从MariaDB 10.0.22和MariaDB 10.1.8开始。在这种情况下，MariaDB将删除MySQL GTID和其他不需要的事件，而是添加自己的GTID。

trans-unit.source: Replication is a feature allowing the contents of one or more master servers to be mirrored on one or more slave servers.
trans-unit.target: 复制是一种允许一个或多个主服务器的内容在一个或多个从服务器上进行镜像的功能。

trans-unit.source: Replication is a feature allowing the contents of one or more servers (called masters) to be mirrored on one or more servers (called slaves).
trans-unit.target: 复制是一种允许将一个或多个服务器(称为主站)的内容镜像到一个或多个服务器(称为从站)上的功能。

trans-unit.source: Replication is based upon the binary log. However, cascading deletes or updates based on foreign key relations are an internal mechanism, and are not written to the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 复制基于二进制日志。但是，基于外键关系的级联删除或更新是一种内部机制，并且不会写入二进制日志。

trans-unit.source: Replication is most commonly used to support backups as follows:

trans-unit.source: Replication latencies and delays lead to issues with "Critical Reads".
trans-unit.target: 复制延时和延迟会导致 "关键读数 "的问题。

trans-unit.source: Replication of S3 engines to a slave that uses the same S3 storage doesn't work. The slave will stop at any ALTER TABLE ... ENGINE=S3 with an error that the table already exists in S3.
trans-unit.target: 无法将S3引擎复制到使用相同S3存储的从属服务器。从站将在任何 ALTER TABLE ... ENGINE=S3 处停止，并显示该表已存在于S3中的错误。

trans-unit.source: Replication slave is in the process of connecting to its master.
trans-unit.target: 复制从机正在与主机连接的过程中。

trans-unit.source: Replication slaves cannot connect to replication masters using Unix socket files or Windows named pipes. The replication slave must connect to the replication master using TCP/IP.
trans-unit.target: 复制从站不能使用Unix套接字文件或Windows命名管道连接到复制主站。复制从机必须使用TCP/IP连接到复制主机。

trans-unit.source: Requesting or waiting for an external lock for a specific table. The storage engine determines what kind of external lock to use. For example, the MyISAM storage engine uses file-based locks. However, MyISAM's external locks are disabled by default, due to the default value of the skip_external_locking system variable. Transactional storage engines such as InnoDB also register the transaction or statement with MariaDB's transaction coordinator while in this thread state. See MDEV-19391 for more information about that.
trans-unit.target: 请求或等待特定表的外部锁定。该存储引擎决定了什么样的外部锁使用。例如，MyISAM存储引擎使用基于文件的锁。但是，由于 skip_external_locking 系统变量的默认值，默认情况下禁用MyISAM的外部锁。处于这种线程状态时，诸如InnoDB之类的事务存储引擎也会在MariaDB的事务协调器中注册事务或语句。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-19391。

trans-unit.source: Requires -R or --read-from-remote-server . Will not stop at the end of the requested binlog but rather continue printing until the end of the last binlog of the MariaDB server. If you send the output to the same MariaDB server, that may lead to an endless loop.
trans-unit.target: 需要 -R 或 --read-from-remote-server 。不会在请求的二进制日志的结尾处停止，而是继续打印，直到MariaDB服务器的最后一个二进制日志的结尾。如果将输出发送到相同的MariaDB服务器，则可能导致无限循环。

trans-unit.source: Returns 0 if N < N1, 1 if N < N2, 2 if N < N3 and so on or -1 if N is NULL. All arguments are treated as integers. It is required that N1 < N2 < N3 < ... < Nn for this function to work correctly. This is because a fast binary search is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果N <N1，则返回0；如果N <N2，则返回1；如果N <N3，则返回2，依此类推；如果N为NULL，则返回-1。所有参数均视为整数。要使此功能正常工作，需要N1 <N2 <N3 <... <Nn。这是因为使用了快速的二进制搜索。

trans-unit.source: Returns 0 if the process terminates in time, or does not exist, and 1 otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果进程及时终止或不存在,返回0,否则返回1。

trans-unit.source: Returns 0 or 1 if a JPATH is contained in the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档中包含JPATH,则返回0或1。

trans-unit.source: Returns 0 or 1 if an element is contained in the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档中包含一个元素,则返回0或1。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if expr is equal to any of the values in the IN list, else returns 0. If all values are constants, they are evaluated according to the type of expr and sorted. The search for the item then is done using a binary search. This means IN is very quick if the IN value list consists entirely of constants. Otherwise, type conversion takes place according to the rules described at Type Conversion, but applied to all the arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果 expr 等于IN列表中的任何值，则返回1 ；否则返回0。如果所有值都是常量，则根据 expr 的类型对它们进行求值并进行排序。然后使用二进制搜索完成对项目的搜索。这意味着，如果IN值列表完全由常量组成，则IN很快。否则，类型转换将根据“ 类型转换”中描述的规则进行，但将应用于所有参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if ColumnStore is in a writes suspended mode. That is, a user executed the SuspendDatabaseWrites.It returns 2 if in a read only state. ColumnStore puts itself into a read only state if it detects a logic error that may have corrupted data. Generally it means a ROLLBACK operation failed. Returns 0 if the system is writable.
trans-unit.target: 如果ColumnStore处于写入暂停模式,则返回1。也就是说,用户执行了SuspendDatabaseWrites.如果处于只读状态,则返回2。如果ColumnStore检测到一个可能破坏数据的逻辑错误,它就会使自己进入只读状态。一般来说,它意味着ROLLBACK操作失败。如果系统可写,则返回0。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if a given LINESTRING's start and end points are the same, or 0 if they are not the same. Before MariaDB 10.1.5, returns NULL if not given a LINESTRING. After MariaDB 10.1.5, returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的LINESTRING的起点和终点相同，则返回1；否则，则返回0。在MariaDB 10.1.5之前，如果未指定LINESTRING，则返回NULL。在MariaDB 10.1.5之后，返回-1。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if a given a numeric binary string IPv6 address, such as returned by INET6_ATON(), is a valid IPv4-mapped address, otherwise returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的数字二进制字符串IPv6地址（例如INET6_ATON（）返回）是有效的IPv4映射地址，则返回1，否则返回0。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if a given numeric binary string IPv6 address, such as returned by INET6_ATON(), is IPv4-compatible, otherwise returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的数字二进制字符串IPv6地址（例如INET6_ATON（）返回的）与IPv4兼容，则返回1，否则返回0。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if the expression is a valid IPv6 address specified as a string, otherwise returns 0. Does not consider IPv4 addresses to be valid IPv6 addresses.
trans-unit.target: 如果表达式是以字符串形式指定的有效IPv6地址,则返回1,否则返回0。不认为IPv4地址是有效的IPv6地址。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if the system can accept queries, 0 if it's not ready yet.
trans-unit.target: 如果系统可以接受查询,返回1;如果还没有准备好,返回0。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether the Minimum Bounding Rectangle of g1 contains the Minimum Bounding Rectangle of g2. This tests the opposite relationship as MBRWithin().
trans-unit.target: 返回1或0以指示g1的最小边界矩形是否包含g2的最小边界矩形。这将测试与MBRWithin（）相反的关系。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether the Minimum Bounding Rectangle of g1 is within the Minimum Bounding Rectangle of g2. This tests the opposite relationship as MBRContains().
trans-unit.target: 返回1或0以指示g1的最小边界矩形是否在g2的最小边界矩形内。这将测试与MBRContains（）相反的关系。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether the Minimum Bounding Rectangles of the two geometries g1 and g2 overlap. The term spatially overlaps is used if two geometries intersect and their intersection results in a geometry of the same dimension but not equal to either of the given geometries.
trans-unit.target: 返回1或0以指示两个几何 g1 和 g2 的最小边界矩形是否重叠。如果两个几何形状相交并且它们的相交导致相同尺寸但不等于任何给定几何形状的几何形状，则使用术语空间重叠。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether the Minimum Bounding Rectangles of the two geometries g1 and g2 touch. Two geometries spatially touch if the interiors of the geometries do not intersect, but the boundary of one of the geometries intersects either the boundary or the interior of the other.
trans-unit.target: 返回1或0以指示两个几何 g1 和 g2 的最小边界矩形是否接触。如果几何的内部不相交，则两个几何在空间上接触，但是其中一个几何的边界与另一个的边界或内部相交。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether the Minimum Bounding Rectangles of the two geometries g1 and g2 are disjoint. Two geometries are disjoint if they do not intersect, that is touch or overlap.
trans-unit.target: 返回1或0,表示两个几何体g1和g2的最小边界矩形是否不相交。如果两个几何体不相交,也就是不接触或不重叠,则为不相交。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether the Minimum Bounding Rectangles of the two geometries g1 and g2 are the same.
trans-unit.target: 返回1或0,表示两个几何体g1和g2的最小边界矩形是否相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether the Minimum Bounding Rectangles of the two geometries g1 and g2 intersect.
trans-unit.target: 返回1或0,表示两个几何体g1和g2的最小边界矩形是否相交。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1, 0 or -1
Returns 1, 0 or -1.
Returns 1 if expr matches pat or 0 if it doesn't match. If either expr or pat are NULL, the result is NULL.
trans-unit.target: 返回 1 ，如果 expr 比赛 pat 或 0 ，如果它不匹配。如果 expr 或 pat 为NULL，则结果为NULL。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if g1 spatially crosses g2. Returns NULL if g1 is a Polygon or a MultiPolygon, or if g2 is a Point or a MultiPoint. Otherwise, returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 g1 在空间上跨越 g2 ,则返回 1 。如果 g1 是Polygon或MultiPolygon，或者 g2 是Point或MultiPoint，则返回 NULL 。否则，返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if geometry g1 spatially crosses geometry g2. Returns NULL if g1 is a Polygon or a MultiPolygon, or if g2 is a Point or a MultiPoint. Otherwise, returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果几何 g1 在空间上与几何 g2 相交，则返回 1 。如果 g1 是Polygon或MultiPolygon，或者 g2 是Point或MultiPoint，则返回 NULL 。否则，返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if the data was copied successfully, or 0 if copying the data failed.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功复制了数据，则返回 1 ;如果复制失败，则返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether g1 is spatially disjoint from (does not intersect) g2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 1 或 0 以指示 g1 在空间上是否与 g2 不相交（不相交）。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether g1 is spatially within g2. This tests the opposite relationship as Contains().
trans-unit.target: 返回 1 或 0 以指示 g1 在空间上是否在 g2 内。这将测试与 Contains() 相反的关系。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether g1 spatially overlaps g2. The term spatially overlaps is used if two geometries intersect and their intersection results in a geometry of the same dimension but not equal to either of the given geometries.
trans-unit.target: 返回 1 或 0 以指示 g1 在空间上是否重叠 g2 。如果两个几何形状相交并且它们的相交导致相同尺寸但不等于任何给定几何形状的几何形状，则使用术语空间重叠。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether g1 spatially touches g2. Two geometries spatially touch if the interiors of the geometries do not intersect, but the boundary of one of the geometries intersects either the boundary or the interior of the other.
trans-unit.target: 返回 1 或 0 以指示 g1 是否在空间上接触 g2 。如果几何的内部不相交，则两个几何在空间上接触，但是其中一个几何的边界与另一个的边界或内部相交。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether g1 is spatially equal to g2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 1 或 0 以指示 g1 在空间上是否等于 g2 。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether a geometry g1 completely contains geometry g2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 1 或 0 以指示几何 g1 是否完全包含几何 g2 。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether a geometry g1 completely contains geometry g2. CONTAINS() is based on the original MySQL implementation and uses object bounding rectangles, while ST_CONTAINS() uses object shapes.
trans-unit.target: 返回 1 或 0 以指示几何 g1 是否完全包含几何 g2 。CONTAINS（）基于原始MySQL实现，并使用对象边界矩形，而ST_CONTAINS（）使用对象形状。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether geometry g1 is spatially disjoint from (does not intersect with) geometry g2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 1 或 0 以指示几何 g1 是否在空间上与几何 g2 不相交（不相交）。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether geometry g1 is spatially equal to geometry g2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 1 或 0 以指示几何 g1 在空间上是否等于几何 g2 。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether geometry g1 is spatially within geometry g2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 1 或 0 以指示几何 g1 在空间上是否在几何 g2 内。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether geometry g1 spatially intersects geometry g2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 1 或 0 以指示几何 g1 在空间上是否与几何 g2 相交。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether geometry g1 spatially overlaps geometry g2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 1 或 0 以指示几何 g1 在空间上是否与几何 g2 重叠。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 or 0 to indicate whether geometry g1 spatially touches geometry g2. Two geometries spatially touch if the interiors of the geometries do not intersect, but the boundary of one of the geometries intersects either the boundary or the interior of the other.
trans-unit.target: 返回 1 或 0 以指示几何 g1 是否在空间上接触几何 g2 。如果几何的内部不相交，则两个几何在空间上接触，但是其中一个几何的边界与另一个的边界或内部相交。

trans-unit.source: Returns NULL if any argument is NULL, or if the second or third argument are not in the allowed range.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何参数为 NULL ，或者第二个或第三个参数不在允许的范围内，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns datetime_expr2 - datetime_expr1, where datetime_expr1 and datetime_expr2 are date or datetime expressions. One expression may be a date and the other a datetime; a date value is treated as a datetime having the time part '00:00:00' where necessary. The unit for the result (an integer) is given by the unit argument. The legal values for unit are the same as those listed in the description of the TIMESTAMPADD() function, i.e MICROSECOND, SECOND, MINUTE, HOUR, DAY, WEEK, MONTH, QUARTER, or YEAR.
trans-unit.target: 返回 datetime_expr2 - datetime_expr1 ，其中 datetime_expr1 和 datetime_expr2 是日期或日期时间表达式。一个表达式可以是日期，另一个可以是日期时间。在必要时，将日期值视为具有时间部分“ 00:00:00”的日期时间。结果的单位（整数）由unit参数指定。单位的合法值与TIMESTAMPADD（）函数的说明中列出的值相同，即，MICROSECOND，SECOND，MINUTE，HOUR，DAY，WEEK，MONTH，QUARTER或YEAR。

trans-unit.source: Returns NULL for wrong arguments to UNIX_TIMESTAMP(). In MySQL and MariaDB before 5.3 wrong arguments to UNIX_TIMESTAMP() returned 0.
trans-unit.target: 对于 UNIX_TIMESTAMP() 的错误参数，返回NULL 。在MySQL和MariaDB之前的5.3版中， UNIX_TIMESTAMP() 的错误参数返回0。

trans-unit.source: Returns NULL if any of the arguments are null, a given path does not locate an object, or if the json_doc argument is not an object.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何参数为空,给定的路径没有定位到对象,或者json_doc参数不是对象,则返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: Returns NULL if any of the arguments argument are null or the path argument does not identify a value in the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何参数参数为空,或者路径参数没有识别文档中的值,返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: Returns NULL if expr1 = expr2
trans-unit.target: 如果expr1=expr2,则返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: Returns NULL if expr1 = expr2 is true, otherwise returns expr1. This is the same as CASE WHEN expr1 = expr2 THEN NULL ELSE expr1 END.
trans-unit.target: 如果expr1 = expr2为true，则返回NULL，否则返回expr1。这是相同的CASE WHEN表达式1 =表达式2 THEN ELSE NULL END expr1的。

trans-unit.source: Returns NULL if expr1 = expr2.
trans-unit.target: 如果expr1=expr2,返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: Returns NULL if given a NULL argument. If the result is empty (a length of zero), returns either an empty string, or, from MariaDB 10.3.6 with SQL_MODE=Oracle, NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定NULL参数，则返回NULL。如果结果为空（长度为零），则返回一个空字符串，或者从MariaDB 10.3.6使用SQL_MODE = Oracle返回 NULL。

trans-unit.source: Returns NULL if given a NULL argument. If the result is empty (zero length), returns either an empty string or, from MariaDB 10.3.6 with SQL_MODE=Oracle, NULL.

trans-unit.target: 返回一个组合边界的闭合几何体。

trans-unit.target: 返回作为几何 g1 和 g2 的并集的几何。

trans-unit.source: Returns a random DOUBLE precision floating point value v in the range 0 <= v < 1.0. If a constant integer argument N is specified, it is used as the seed value, which produces a repeatable sequence of column values. In the example below, note that the sequences of values produced by RAND(3) is the same both places where it occurs.
trans-unit.target: 返回范围为0 <= v <1.0 的随机 DOUBLE 精度浮点值v。如果指定了常量整数参数N，它将用作种子值，这将产生可重复的列值序列。在下面的示例中，请注意RAND（3）生成的值的序列在出现的两个地方都是相同的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a representation of the unix_timestamp argument as a value in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' or YYYYMMDDHHMMSS.uuuuuu format, depending on whether the function is used in a string or numeric context. The value is expressed in the current time zone. unix_timestamp is an internal timestamp value such as is produced by the UNIX_TIMESTAMP() function.
trans-unit.target: 返回unix_timestamp参数的表示形式，其值为'YYYY-MM-DD HH：MM：SS'或YYYYMMDDHHMMSS.uuuuuu格式，具体取决于该函数是在字符串还是在数字上下文中使用。该值以当前时区表示。unix_timestamp是内部时间戳值，例如UNIX_TIMESTAMP（）函数产生的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set value (a string containing substrings separated by "," characters) consisting of the strings that have the corresponding bit in bits set. str1 corresponds to bit 0, str2 to bit 1, and so on. NULL values in str1, str2, ... are not appended to the result.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个设置值（一个包含用“，”字符分隔的子字符串的字符串），该字符串由在位中具有相应位的字符串组成。 str1 对应于位0， str2 对应于位1，依此类推。 str1 ， str2 ，...中的NULL值不会附加到结果中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a soundex string from str. Two strings that sound almost the same should have identical soundex strings. A standard soundex string is four characters long, but the SOUNDEX() function returns an arbitrarily long string. You can use SUBSTRING() on the result to get a standard soundex string. All non-alphabetic characters in str are ignored. All international alphabetic characters outside the A-Z range are treated as vowels.
trans-unit.target: 从 str 返回一个soundex字符串。听起来几乎相同的两个弦应该具有相同的soundex弦。标准soundex字符串长四个字符，但是 SOUNDEX() 函数返回任意长的字符串。您可以在结果上使用 SUBSTRING() 以获取标准的soundex字符串。 str 中的所有非字母字符都将被忽略。AZ范围以外的所有国际字母字符都被视为元音。
